servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

ptxt.emph: P0137: O2 Sensor Circuit Voltage Low (Bank 1, Sensor 2)

entry.ptxt: Output voltage of HO2S signal circuit is lower than 0.02 V for 25 sec.

ptxt.emph: P0138: O2 Sensor Circuit Voltage High (Bank 1, Sensor 2)

entry.ptxt: Output voltage of HO2S signal circuit is higher than 4.5 V for 5 sec. even if HO2S heater is turned ON for specified times.

item.ptxt: When performing a road test, select a place where there is no traffic or possibility of a traffic accident and be very careful during testing to avoid occurrence of an accident.
Road test should be carried out by 2 persons, a driver and a tester, on a level road.

attention3.ptxt: If DTC other than aimed DTC are previously detected in DTC confirmation procedure, be sure to troubleshoot DTC previously detected.

s1.ptxt: Start engine and warm up to normal operating temperature.
Drive vehicle at 50 – 60 km/h (31 – 37 mile/h) for 3 min. (Keep throttle valve opening constantly in this step.)

testgroup.question: Was “Engine and Emission Control System Check” performed?

action.ptxt: Go to Engine and Emission Control System Check:J24B .

testgroup.title: DTC Check
testgroup.question: Is there any DTC(s) other than P0137 and P0138?

action.ptxt: Go to troubleshooting for applicable DTC.

testgroup.title: HO2S signal circuit and ground circuit check

test1.ptxt: Turn OFF ignition switch and disconnect connectors from HO2S and ECM.
Check for proper terminal connection to HO2S and ECM connectors.
If connections are OK, check that HO2S signal circuit (A3) and ground circuit (A4) are as follows.

item.ptxt: Wiring harness resistance of each HO2S signal circuit and ground circuit is less than 3 Ω.
Insulation resistance of HO2S signal circuit and ground circuit is infinity between HO2S connector and vehicle body ground.
Insulation resistance of wire harness is infinity between HO2S signal terminal and each other terminal at HO2S connector.
Insulation resistance of wire harness is infinity between HO2S ground circuit terminal and each other terminal.
Circuit voltage of HO2S signal circuit and ground circuit is 0 – 1 V with ignition switch in ON position.

testgroup.question: Are they in good condition?

action.ptxt: Repair or replace defective wire harness.

testgroup.title: Exhaust system and air intake system check

test1.ptxt: Check exhaust system and air intake system for clogging or leak.

testgroup.question: Is it in good condition?

test1.ptxt: Check HO2S heater circuit referring to Step 2 through Step 3 of DTC P0037 / P0038:J24B .

testgroup.title: DTC recheck

test1.ptxt: Perform DTC confirmation procedure and check DTC.

testgroup.question: Is DTC P0137 or P0138 still detected?

action.ptxt: Substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.
